column4: hi can someone help me? im trying to make: /home/mathieu/Desktop/ati-driver-installer-9-9-x86.x86_64.run a deb package but terminal keeps giving me:  Permission denied
welcome. that usually happens when you download the file from someone who hasn't modded permissions on it properly.
open terminal, then do: chmod a+x /path/to/file/blah
